data: Madison | Hissawachee settlement | Southern Ohio | Cap’n Lumsden
Hissawachee settlement | Southern Ohio | Cap’n Lumsden’s
beginning of the reign of Madison
It was in those old times of the beginning of the reign of Madison, that the people of the Hissawachee settlement, in Southern Ohio, prepared to attend “the corn-shuckin' down at Cap’n Lumsden’s.”
